channel.title: Auto saving issue!
channel.description:
So big surprise, having issues with a PI source.. I cant seem to get the server to automatically save every 30 seconds or so..
This is my config auto save code.. [code=cpp]public static final int SAVE_TIMER = 25[/code]
this is my playersaving.java [code=cpp] private static final int SAVE_TIMER = 25000;[/code]
or if I could make some kind of auto save program that will save a players file when they walk/bank/drop an item this issue could be adverted. (Can't find anything on google about it)
any help is appreciated!

item.title: Auto saving issue!
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

if your saving isn’t done asynchronously (lets face it, it probably isn’t) doing an autosave every 30 seconds is a terrible idea

Read full topic
